attributes.action: collect his congressional gold medal before he leaves office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In May 2003 Tony Blair was awarded a congressional gold medal for "outstanding and enduring contributions to maintaining the security of all freedom-loving nations" which, three years later, has still not been collected. He was awarded this in his capacity as prime mininster and failing to collect it as such would be a snub to the American people.
